pages.text:
Innisbrook Membership
Become a Member of the Club by contacting us at
[email protected]
or
727.370.4678
.
Discover a place where every day feels like a getaway. Innisbrook’s Memberships invite you to embrace a lifestyle of leisure, connection, and spirited recreation. With five thoughtfully designed membership options, you’ll enjoy year-round access to championship golf, rejuvenating spa treatments, family-friendly amenities, and the warmth of a private club community. Whether you're seeking active adventures or serene moments, Innisbrook offers the freedom to live well—your way.
Membership Types
Membership Inquiry
Membership Application
Tee Off in Style:
Exclusive Access to Championship Golf
Golf enthusiasts, rejoice! As a member,
you gain privileged access to 63 holes of golf, each distinct course renowned for its
unique challenges and stunning landscapes. Elevate your game, connect with fellow golfers, and relish the privilege of teeing off on meticulously designed fairways.
Rally on the Courts:
Tennis Experiences Tailored to You
For those who thrive on the court, our membership offers access to tennis experiences that cater to all skill levels. Serve up sunshine and enjoy friendly matches, personalized coaching, and social events that bring the tennis community together in an atmosphere of camaraderie.
Dive into Indulgence:
Heated Pools for Year-Round Enjoyment
With your Innisbrook membership, a world of relaxation unfolds. Immerse yourself in a collection of heated pools that cater to every mood. Whether you seek a tranquil soak, a refreshing swim, or a rush down the Loch Ness waterslides, our poolside oasis is the perfect place to unwind in any season.
Culinary Excellence:
Fine Dining Experiences Beyond Compare
Tantalize your taste buds with our culinary offerings that promise a symphony of flavors. As an Innisbrook member, you're invited to savor exclusive savings and gourmet creations - from casual bites and crafted cocktails to exquisite dinners and holiday specials. Plus, get invited to special dinner gatherings and chef demonstrations for members only.
Serenity Awaits:
Wellness for Mind and Body
Escape and awaken your senses at our serene Salamander Spa. Membership opens the door to exclusive savings on a range of treatments designed to pamper and restore. Indulge in massages, facials, and wellness rituals that guide you toward a state of blissful relaxation.
Elevate Your Fitness Journey:
Dynamic Classes & Advanced Equipment
Elevate your well-being with access to a well-equipped fitness center that caters to your every exercise need. From cardiovascular training to strength building, our state-of-the-art facility empowers your fitness journey. Immerse yourself in our dynamic range of fitness classes, catering to all levels. Engage in invigorating yoga for mindfulness or high-energy group sessions for endurance.

Domestic Partner

Domestic Partner Affirmation and Agreement
Affirmation
We, the undersigned Member and Domestic Partner state that:  (a) the Domestic Partner has resided at Member’s primary residence for at least the past year, (b) we have a spousal relationship not evidenced by a marriage license but legally eligible to be married to the Member. As evidence of this spousal relationship, we offer the Club acceptable documents supporting this relationship.
Agreement
Based upon the above, the undersigned parties agree as follows:
The Domestic Partner is hereby entitled to have the same right of use of the Club facilities under the Code of Regulations as the Member and shall be provided with a membership card.
The Member and the Domestic Partner agree to be jointly and severally liable for all charges and fees incurred by the Domestic Partner while this membership privilege is in effect.
This membership privilege shall be subject to termination by the Member or by the Domestic Partner at any time by giving written notice to the Club.  The membership privilege and liability hereunder shall stand terminated at the time the Club receives said notice.  If this membership privilege exists at the date of death of Member, the Domestic Partner shall be deemed the widow or widower of the Member under this Code.
The Domestic Partner agrees to accept all responsibilities of membership as if he or she was a spouse of the Member.
The parties agree that this agreement shall have no effect upon the personal or contractual rights of the parties other than as set forth in this agreement.
AGREED TO and EFFECTIVE this date:
Date
but subject to cancellation or modification as provided in Section B 1 of Article II of the Code.

Credit Card & Bank References
Upon signing this application, I hereby grant permission to The Club to verify my credit status. I also grant permission to charge my credit card for any charges to my membership account that are more than 30 days past due. If accepted for membership, I agree to be bound and abide by The Club’s Code of Regulations of which I understand is subject to change by the Board of Governors; and I hereby acknowledge receipt of a copy of the present Code of Regulations. Membership in The Club is not transferable, except as provided in the Code of Regulations.
I acknowledge that I have been advised with respect to the following facts:
1. The privileges and related dues of the class of membership for which this application is made and the limitations of those privileges.
2. The Board of Governors reserves the right to amend the Code of Regulations from time to time and determine dues levels and fees on an annual basis.
3. The Board of Governors (or any committee designated by the Board) retains the right to discipline or suspend members of the Club for any conduct deemed by the Board of Governors to warrant such action.
4. If my application is accepted, the initiation fee or recurring annual fee (calendar based) is non-refundable. 5. Membership dues and other expenditures are due and payable within 30 days of billing date. A late payment charge may be assessed on all account balances, which are delinquent. Late payment charges use a monthly periodic rate of 1.5% based on the previous balance less payments and credits. The Annual Percentage Rate (APR) is 18%. Upon approval by The Club, this application and its terms shall constitute a binding contract. In the event that collection is necessary, the member shall be responsible for all collection-related fees including but not limited to, attorney’s fees and court costs of The Club, and venue shall be in Pinellas County, Florida.
6. If initiation fee is applicable, I agree to pay any initiation fee as detailed below.
7. Membership Cancellation— Cancellation of Membership releases all rights, interests and privileges in The Club and is outlined within the Code of Regulations. Cancellation requires submitting written notification to either the Innisbrook Membership office, emailing membership@innisbrookresort.com or by fax to 727.942.5203. Once written notification is received, membership will be cancelled at the end of the notification month. Member is financially responsible for dues, fees and any other charges incurred on account.

Auto-Pay Option Form
Upon completing and submitting this application, I agree to the Auto Pay Option for this membership account.  By choosing this option I will avoid possible late fees.  During the first week of each month, member statements are emailed and I will have the option to review all monthly charges and inquire with any questions. My credit card on file will be billed the third week of each month for all outstanding balances listed on my statement.
Yes, I agree to Auto Pay
No, I do not want to sign up for Auto Pay
Upon completing and signing this form, you have selected the Auto-Pay option for your Member account. It’s easy, and by choosing this option, you can avoid possible late fees.
During the first week of each month, you will receive a Member account statement. This allows you the opportunity to review your monthly charges and call or email if you have any questions. Around the 20th of each month, your credit card on file will be charged for the outstanding balance listed on your statement.
Print Name as it appears on credit card:

Innisbrook Membership
Become a Member of the Club by contacting us at
[email protected]
or
727.370.4678
.
Discover a place where every day feels like a getaway. Innisbrook’s Memberships invite you to embrace a lifestyle of leisure, connection, and spirited recreation. With five thoughtfully designed membership options, you’ll enjoy year-round access to championship golf, rejuvenating spa treatments, family-friendly amenities, and the warmth of a private club community. Whether you're seeking active adventures or serene moments, Innisbrook offers the freedom to live well—your way.
Membership Types
Membership Inquiry
Membership Application
Tee Off in Style:
Exclusive Access to Championship Golf
Golf enthusiasts, rejoice! As a member,
you gain privileged access to 63 holes of golf, each distinct course renowned for its
unique challenges and stunning landscapes. Elevate your game, connect with fellow golfers, and relish the privilege of teeing off on meticulously designed fairways.
Rally on the Courts:
Tennis Experiences Tailored to You
For those who thrive on the court, our membership offers access to tennis experiences that cater to all skill levels. Serve up sunshine and enjoy friendly matches, personalized coaching, and social events that bring the tennis community together in an atmosphere of camaraderie.

With your Innisbrook membership, a world of relaxation unfolds. Immerse yourself in a collection of heated pools that cater to every mood. Whether you seek a tranquil soak, a refreshing swim, or a rush down the Loch Ness waterslides, our poolside oasis is the perfect place to unwind in any season.
Culinary Excellence:
Fine Dining Experiences Beyond Compare
Tantalize your taste buds with our culinary offerings that promise a symphony of flavors. As an Innisbrook member, you're invited to savor exclusive savings and gourmet creations - from casual bites and crafted cocktails to exquisite dinners and holiday specials. Plus, get invited to special dinner gatherings and chef demonstrations for members only.
Serenity Awaits:
Wellness for Mind and Body
Escape and awaken your senses at our serene Salamander Spa. Membership opens the door to exclusive savings on a range of treatments designed to pamper and restore. Indulge in massages, facials, and wellness rituals that guide you toward a state of blissful relaxation.
Elevate Your Fitness Journey:
Dynamic Classes & Advanced Equipment
Elevate your well-being with access to a well-equipped fitness center that caters to your every exercise need. From cardiovascular training to strength building, our state-of-the-art facility empowers your fitness journey. Immerse yourself in our dynamic range of fitness classes, catering to all levels. Engage in invigorating yoga for mindfulness or high-energy group sessions for endurance.

Meet the Team
Patrick House
DIRECTOR OF SALES & MARKETING
Patrick brings more than two decades of hospitality experience to Innisbrook with a proven track record in driving revenues, elevating brand presence, and delivering exceptional guest experiences. His career includes key leadership roles with the Westin brand under Marriott and nearly eight years with Pearl River Resort, home to the nationally ranked Dancing Rabbit Golf Club, where he led successful sales and marketing initiatives that contributed to the property's national acclaim.
Now a proud resident of Florida, Patrick is excited to join the Innisbrook team and help shape the future of this iconic Florida golf resort through innovative strategy and strong industry partnerships.
Outside of work, Patrick enjoys attending sporting events, golfing, family trips to Disney World, exploring his new home state and spending quality time with his wife, Katie, and their three children.
view profile
+
Rachel Bridger-Tomlinson
Assistant Director of Sales
Rachel Bridger-Tomlinson brings nearly two decades of global hospitality experience to her role as Assistant Director of Sales at Innisbrook Resort. With a strong background spanning luxury city properties, resorts, and destination hotels, Rachel has built a proven track record of driving revenue growth, building lasting client partnerships, and creating exceptional guest experiences. Her career includes leadership positions with some of the world’s most recognized hotel brands, where she specialized in group sales, leisure, and international markets.
At Innisbrook, Rachel is passionate about showcasing the resort’s unique offerings, from championship golf and meeting venues to its renowned guest hospitality, while fostering meaningful relationships with clients and partners to position Innisbrook as a premier destination for meetings and events.
When she’s not working, Rachel embraces Florida’s coastal lifestyle, enjoying time on the water, boating with her family, and exploring the region’s beautiful barrier islands.
view profile
+
Craig Cochran
REGIONAL SALES DIRECTOR
Craig joined the Innisbrook team in September of 2021. With over 20 years of experience in the hospitality industry, Craig brings a wealth of knowledge to the resort. He graduated from James Madison University in 1999 with a BS in Recreation & Leisure Studies. After graduating, he worked for 2 internationally renowned tradeshow production companies, Discover the Palm Beaches, the Boca Raton Resort & Club, and most recently, PGA National Resort & Spa. Craig’s attributes his success to anticipating his client’s needs and providing a seamless experience for his clients. Craig enjoys spending time with his 4 children and discovering Florida’s hidden gems.
view profile
+
Brigid Acrey
National Sales Manager
With over 14 years of multi-brand experience in the hospitality industry, Brigid has a proven track record in developing and executing successful sales and marketing plans, increasing market share, and driving revenue growth. Her portfolio experience includes Hilton, Marriott, and Boutique Hotels. Brigid enjoys spending time with her family, trying new restaurants in the area and working on projects around the house.
view profile
+
Billy Oosting
DIRECTOR, SALAMANDER COLLECTION GOLF SALES
Billy serves as a Senior Golf Sales Manager at Innisbrook Resort specializing in Golf Tournaments and Day Golf Groups. With 10 years of experience in the golf industry, Billy brings plenty of knowledge and passion to the Innisbrook team. Before joining Innisbrook, he spent time working at some notable facilities including Medinah Country Club in IL. Most recently, Billy served as the assistant golf professional of Innisbrook’s Copperhead Course; He took on his new role in 2017. Billy enjoys playing golf with friends and clients, kayaking, and rooting for his Detroit sports teams.
view profile
+
Tim Thompson
SENIOR GOLF SALES MANAGER
With a focus on customer service, Mr. Thompson joined the Salamander family in February 2007. Tim has been in the golf industry for over 30 years and in Hospitality for nearly 17 years. Tim's focus is on ensuring the success of each and every group's program. Tim has the proven ability to create unique member, junior and guest experiences using innovative and dynamic programs. Tim enjoys spending time with his kids swimming, traveling, and attending local sporting events.
view profile
+
Eric Carlson
SENIOR GOLF SALES MANAGER
As an experienced National Sales Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the hospitality industry, Eric is here to handle the Midwest, Southeast, and European markets. With over 20 years of experience in the hospitality industry, this native of Rockport, MA is ready to create a memorable experience for your group golf outing, charity/celebrity tournament, or incentive trip. Prior to joining the Innisbrook team, Eric was a National Golf Sales Manager for Reunion Resort and Hammock Beach Golf Resort. He was also part of the opening team for the Omni Orlando Resort at ChampionsGate, serving as their Golf and Corporate Sales Manager.
view profile
+
Trevor Pedersen
Golf Sales Manager
Trevor joined the Innisbrook team in July of 2025.  With over 10 years of experience in the hospitality and golf industries, Trevor's focus on client relations helps to ensure a memorable and seamless experience for every group's program. A native of Charleston, SC, he joins us from Hotel Bennett within the Salamander Collection. He also brings experience from Wild Dunes Resort and Golfbreaks, an international golf wholesaler. Outside of work he enjoys outdoor activities, hanging out with his dog & family/friends, and watching sports.
view profile
+
Alana Owens
DIRECTOR OF CATERING & CONFERENCE SERVICES
A born-and-raised Floridian, Alana brings 20 years of resort hospitality experience to the team. After spending time living in Seattle and traveling the world, she’s developed a deep appreciation for different cultures, great service, and creating memorable experiences. When she’s not enjoying the beauty of Innisbrook Resort, Alana is off on an outdoor adventure or planning her next travel destination.
view profile
+
Annie Waltz
Catering Sales Manager
With over 8 years of experience in the Hospitality Industry from Restaurant Management to Conference Services, Annie joined us as our Catering and Conference Services Coordinator in March of 2022, moving her way up to Catering Sales Manager. Annie received her Bachelor’s Degree in Hospitality Management from The University of South Florida and her Certification in Wedding and Event Planning through Pasco/Hernando State College. Annie expresses great joy in planning special events, taking someone’s vision, and bringing it to life. In addition to planning events, Annie enjoys spending quality time with her three children, hiking, and going to Zumba.
view profile
+
Scott Cathcart
Conference Services Manager
Joining the team in September, Scott brings over 25 years of experience in Catering and Conference Services across various hotels, resorts, and marinas of all sizes. A native of Stuart, Florida, Scott has been on the West Coast of Florida since his college years at St. Leo University. The bulk of his career includes 16 years with Hyatt, 4 years with Hilton, and, most recently, 5 years at Streamsong Golf Resort. Scott enjoys golf, fishing with friends and family, and cheering for the Pittsburgh Steelers.
view profile
+

DIRECTOR OF SALES & MARKETING

About Us
Please be advised that the Klosterman gate is undergoing enhancements.
Guests and visitors are requested to use the
Belcher gate entrance
.
Innisbrook Resort is nestled on 600 acres of rolling hills and 70 acres of lakes on the west coast of Central Florida
Only 20 miles from Tampa International Airport, the Resort appeals to visitors seeking the ultimate golf resort experience in a locale that is easily accessible and is within minutes of the beaches on the Gulf of Mexico.
Innisbrook's collection of four championship golf courses is among the finest in America and is proud to host the PGA TOUR's Valspar Championship every March. With 300 spacious guest rooms and suites, 35,000 square feet of conference facilities and the luxurious Salamander Spa, Innisbrook is the perfect place for leisurely getaways and group meetings.
CHECK-IN: 4 PM |  CHECK-OUT: 11 AM
RESORT FEE | $40
Our $40 Resort Fee covers essential amenities to elevate your stay. Enjoy unlimited in-room wireless internet access, local and toll-free calls, and daily coffee service both in-room and at Fairways. Benefit from self-parking, on-property transportation, 24-hour gated security, and access to amenities such as non-motorized bicycles, swimming pools, fitness center, miniature golf, the Osprey Driving Range with complimentary bucket of golf balls per person, per day, and tennis court access for one hour per stay, per room.

Innisbrook Membership Become a Member of the Club by contacting us at [email protected] or 727.370.4678 . Your family will love everything about our 600-acre golf and spa resort. As an Innisbrook Member, you'll enjoy all of the amazing resort amenities, and so much more. Featuring outstanding golf on four top-rated courses including Copperhead — site of the nationally televised PGA TOUR's Valspar Championship, dining in four unique restaurants, tennis on 11 beautifully maintained clay courts, six swimming pools including the Loch Ness Monster Pool with waterslides, Salamander Spa, Fitness Center, and acres of lakes for fishing. All members enjoy a 20% discount in all four restaurants and a 15% discount in Salamander Spa. Plus, we love treating our members to a year-long special calendar of fun events — just for them . Treat your family to this private Resort and Club experience every day of the year with five Membership options. View the membership packages below to find the one that best suits your family. For more information about membership, please contact our Membership Office by filling out a Membership Inquiry, or contact us at [email protected] or 727.370.4678 . Say "I Do" at Innisbrook Weddings Innisbrook offers beautiful and timeless settings for your special occasion. From intimate ceremonies in a serene garden setting, vows made under a gorgeous oak tree, spa days for the bridal party, and tee times for the gentlemen, to grand receptions in one of our classic and elegant ballrooms - Innisbrook offers a special and unique wedding experience that you'll never forget. Our attentive and dedicated team is here to help you through the planning process and wants to ensure your event reflects your personal tastes and vision.

Membership Inquiry
Membership Application
Golf Memberships
All Golf Memberships include:
Complimentary use of the driving range, tennis and racquetball courts, Fitness Center, and all pools (including Loch Ness Monster Pool).
Membership includes the individual, spouse, and children up to 25 years of age.
Access special savings on:
Dining
Salamander Spa services
Seasonal room rates
Lessons, clinics, and children’s programs
Full Golf Membership
Unlimited play year-round for Member cart fee only.
Executive Golf Membership
Corporate Memberships are available for 2 to 4 families. Executive Golf Members and their families enjoy year-round golf, tennis, and social amenities. The Executive Golf Membership is limited to a maximum of four families per membership.
Executive Golf Privileges Include:
May 1 - October 31: Play for cart fee only
November 1 - April 30: Accompanied guest of Member rate
Monday - Thursday: Copperhead $175, Island $75, North & South $65
Friday - Sunday: Copperhead $200, Island Course $115, North & South Course $75
Resort Golf Membership
Resort Golf Privileges:
May 1 to October 31: Play for Member cart fee only
November 1 to April 30: Accompanied guest of Member rate
Monday to Thursday: Copperhead $175, Island $75, North & South $65
Friday to Sunday: Copperhead $200, Island course $115, North & South Course $75
*Monthly dues paid quarterly in advance and subject to applicable 7% sales tax.
All Innisbrook Memberships are family Memberships that include individual, spouse, and children up to the age of 25 years.
Legacy Golf Membership
Legacy Golf Membership will be extended to the children of existing Full Golf Members, who are at least 25 years of age.
*The initiation Fee may either be paid in full or over a 3-year interest-free payment plan. Monthly dues are billed quarterly in advance.
Young Executive Golf Membership
Young Executive Golf Membership will be extended to people between the ages of 25 to 39.
The initiation Fee may either be paid in full or over a 3-year interest-free payment plan. Monthly dues are billed quarterly in advance.
Social Membership
Social Membership includes:
Complimentary use of Fitness Center and all six pools including the Loch Ness Pool
20% discount on food and beverages in all four restaurants
15% discount at Salamander Spa
Complimentary use of Fitness Center
Access to all six pools on property, including the Loch Ness “Monster” Pool with waterslides
Dine at five distinct restaurants with a Member discount on dining services
Relax and indulge your inner being at the luxurious Salamander Spa with a Member discount on Spa and Salon services
Special seasonal room rates for resort accommodations for friends and family
Member discounts on children’s programs
Use of the golf driving range at Resort rates
Access to tennis and racquetball courts at Resort rates
Walk, ride and explore 900 acres of natural beauty
Annual Memberships are family memberships, which include Annual Tennis Membership
Annual Fee on Social Membership occurs on anniversary date, and is billed month prior. Dues are payable monthly in advance and subject to 7% sales tax. Social Membership must be held the first 12 full calendar months, excluding sign-up partial month, before cancellation is an option. Annual fee and monthly dues are exclusive of 7% sales tax.
Racquet Sports Membership
Racquet Sports Membership includes:
Complimentary use of Fitness Center and all six pools including the Loch Ness Pool
20% discount on food and beverages in all four restaurants
15% discount at Salamander Spa
Complimentary unlimited use of ten Har-Tru tennis courts
Use of golf practice range at Resort rates
Complimentary use of Fitness Center
Complimentary use of all six heated pools including Loch Ness “Monster” pool with waterslides.
Dine at five distinct restaurants with Member discounts on dining services
Relax and indulge your inner being at the luxurious Salamander Spa with a Member discount on Spa and Salon services
Special seasonal room rates for resort accommodations for family and friends
Member discounts on lessons, clinics, and children’s programs
Member charging privileges
Receive monthly member newsletters
Annual Memberships are family memberships, which include individual, spouse, and children up to 25 years of age
Annual Fee on Racquet Sports Membership occurs on anniversary date, and is billed month prior. Dues are payable monthly in advance and subject to 7% sales tax. Racquet Sports Membership must be held the first 12 full calendar months, excluding sign-up partial month, before cancellation is an option. Annual fee and monthly dues are exclusive of 7% sales tax.

Create Your Perfect Celebration
From an intimate family brunch to a grand wedding reception banquet to a spa-inspired bridal retreat, Innisbrook's culinary team offers a menu for any event or occasion. Our catering team is ready to help you customize a unique weekend that your friends and family will remember for a lifetime. Invite your guests to kick off the weekend with a rehearsal dinner with options that range from a poolside reception overlooking one of our spectacular natural areas or golf courses to an elaborate cocktail reception in an elegant ballroom.
For the ultimate celebration, culminate your wedding festivities by saying “thank you” to your guests with our morning-after brunch. With our array of settings and menus, every part of your event is destined to be unique. And in between functions, your guests can continue the festivities by relaxing by the pool or venturing out for a round of golf on any of our four renowned golf courses.
All of our menus are exquisitely designed with one simple goal in mind – culinary perfection. Our award-winning chef will also be delighted to custom create a menu that meets your needs.
For more information, please contact

| 727.942.5288
